input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
3dRose tm_157398_1" Aged 65 Years to Perfection Happy 65Th Birthday" Travel Mug, 14 oz, Multicolor

Product specifications:
14Oz capacity
Made of stainless steel
Easy-Grip handle with thumb rest
Slide opening lid with slanted drinking surface
Not microwave safe, hand washing is recommended

Product description:
input_text.Response A: A travel mug that expresses the sentiment that age is just a number!  The mug features the words "Aged 65 Years to Perfection" with a colorful number "65" on a white background, and also has a multicolored rim.  This 14 oz mug is made of durable stainless steel and has an easy-grip handle with thumb rest, as well as a slide opening lid with slanted drinking surface.  It's not microwave safe, so hand washing is recommended.  A great gift for the birthday girl or guy who is proud of their age!
input_text.Response B: Perfect for the plant lover in your life or to add a pop of green to any space, this set of four artificial succulent plants in stone-like cement pots will add a sophisticated touch to any room. The adorable, lifelike mini succulents can be displayed in your home or office, and are a great gift idea for weddings, birthdays, housewarmings or any special occasion. With their realistic look and vibrant color, these faux succulents will bring a touch of nature to your home without the maintenance of live plants.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
